--- grant_execute_on_table_function.sql
GRANT EXECUTE ON TABLE FUNCTION READ_SingersNameStream TO ROLE hr_manager
--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Grant:     0,
  Privilege: &ast.ExecutePrivilegeOnTableFunction{
    Execute: 6,
    Names:   []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 54,
        Name:    "READ_SingersNameStream",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 63,
      NameEnd: 73,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT EXECUTE ON TABLE FUNCTION READ_SingersNameStream TO ROLE hr_manager
